body:
True or false: EU migrants are pushing down British nationals’ wages
      
       True – areas of the UK with large increases in EU migration suffered lower wages
       False – the big falls in wages after 2008 are due to the global financial crisis and a weak economic recovery, not to immigration 
      
     How much does the EU really cost Britain each week? 
      
       £136m 
       £267m 
       £351m 
       Over £800m 
      
     How many times did David Cameron use the word “in” during the speech where he announced Britain would have a referendum? 
      
       2 
       55
       96
       136
      
     Which of these industries is not likely to be affected if we leave the EU? 
      
       Car manufacturing 
       Tourism 
       Financial services 
       Farming and agriculture 
       None of the above 
      
     What percentage of UK jobs are taken by citizens of other EU countries? 
      
       1.2% 
       6.8% 
       10.7% 
       29.5% 
      
     Benedict Cumberbatch, along with 250 other celebrities, recently signed a petition saying the UK would be culturally better off if … 
      
       We left the EU 
       We stayed in the EU 
      
     How many jobs could Brexit cost the UK according to the latest report commissioned by the CBI? 
      
       30,000 
       470,000 
       950,000 
       3 million
      
     Which other countries have called for the UK to leave the EU? 
      
       France 
       Germany 
       Poland 
       No country has 
      
     How much did EU immigrants cost our job market and economy each year? 
      
       £350m 
       £1.6bn
       £5bn
       Nothing – European immigrants contribute a net gain of £5bn to the UK economy 
      
     What claim did Boris Johnson incorrectly make about EU restrictions to the UK? 
      
       That the EU won’t let us sell wonky bananas
       That the EU restricts the trade of tampons
       That the EU dictates which fruits we are allowed to buy 
       That the EU restricts the use of paper aeroplanes
      
    
    Solutions
    1:B, 2:A, 3:D, 4:E, 5:B, 6:B, 7:C, 8:D, 9:D, 10:A
    Scores
    
     10 and above.Congratulations! You really know your stuff
     9 and above.Congratulations! You really know your stuff
     8 and above.Congratulations! You really know your stuff
     7 and above.Nearly there! You need to brush up on your Brexit facts
     6 and above.Nearly there! You need to brush up on your Brexit facts
     5 and above.Nearly there! You need to brush up on your Brexit facts
     4 and above.Oops! Why not try again?
     3 and above.Oops! Why not try again?
     2 and above.Oops! Why not try again?
     0 and above.Oops! Why not try again?
     1 and above.Oops! Why not try again?
webTitle: How much do you know about Brexit and UK jobs? – quiz
